title: Oceania 2017 Worlds Meet Up
body:
Greetings to all,

A friend and I are going to the 2017 Worlds semi final and grand final (ticket sales depending) 
and we are curious if there were any other else going so we can make an OCE stand at Worlds
to make utter fools of ourselves as Aussies do when overseas.
Please would love a band of rascals to join us for shenanigans.

replies.body: If you guys do end up going, please go to the korean stand and offer them a vegemite sandwich.
do you really need to ask that? Because it's an Australian thing to do, and it will confuse everyone from other countries, which is also an Australian thing to do.
Make sure someone records it and puts it up on Youtube (as well as every other video hosting service out there).
Lucky bastards! Wish I could join you, but not only would I have to pay double to bring both my heads (something something Tasmanian joke), I can't even afford one ticket to Worlds!
hahaha i just hope we get tickets for worlds since they arent out yet i dont think
